import React,{useState}from'react';import'./FAQ.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FAQ=()=>{const[activeIndex,setActiveIndex]=useState(null);// FAQs minimizadas y actualizadas
